description: TEHRAN – Mohsen Kaveh resigned from his post as head coach of Iran freestyle wrestling team on Friday.
title: Mohsen Kaveh no longer Iran wrestling coach

description: TEHRAN – Esteghlal football team were awarded two penalties against Malavan in Matchweek 2 of the 2024/25 Iran Professional League (PGPL) thanks to VAR intervention on Friday.
title: Esteghlal escape defeat against Malavan thanks to VAR

description: TEHRAN - An oil tanker has changed route after coming under attack by Yemen’s Ansarallah in the Red Sea.
title: Oil tanker heading to Israeli port struck

description: The Arbaeen pilgrimage is a profoundly unique experience, especially for first-timers. Walking tens of kilometers under the scorching sun to reach the holy shrine of Imam Hossein (AS), sharing space with people from diverse backgrounds and nationalities, and relying on the kindness of strangers for sustenance and shelter, are all experiences far removed from daily life.
title: Arbaeen of Disavowal

description: TEHRAN - Donald Trump has claimed that Kamala Harris, the U.S. vice president and the Democratic candidate for the upcoming presidential elections, “hates” Israel and is responsible for the Hamas attack on southern Israel on October 7 last year.
title: Don’t give wrong address on Oct. 7 attack

description: TEHRAN- The permanent mission of Iran to the United Nations in New York has recently organized a ceremony to honor victims of terrorism.
title: Iran commemorates terror victims on UN Day against terrorism

description: TEHRAN- The chief of staff of the Iranian Armed Forces extended his congratulations to Brigadier General Nasir Zadeh following his confirmation by Iranian Parliament as the new Iran’s minister of defense.
title: Iran’s armed forces chief congratulates new defense minister on confirmation

description: TEHRAN- The Iranian Minister of Interior held a meeting with border officials from both Iran and Iraq at the Munthrya border crossing, situated on the Iraqi side of the Khosravi border, to address the security measures for pilgrims participating in the Arbaeen Walk.
title: Iran, Iraq officials meet at border crossing to discuss Arbaeen Walk

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s intelligence forces have apprehended 14 members of the Daesh terrorist group across four provinces in the country.
title: Iranian intelligence captures 14 Daesh members in nationwide operations

description: TEHRAN – There are significant opportunities for cooperation between Iran and Japan, particularly in the energy and economic sectors, said Iranian Foreign Minister Abbas Araqchi during an interview with Japanese media.
title: Araqchi highlights potential for cooperation with Japan amid illegal U.S. sanctions

description: TEHRAN – A high-ranking commander of Iran’s Islamic Revolution Guards Corps (IRGC) has issued a stern warning that Resistance forces will persist in their operations as long as the United States-backed Israeli airstrikes on Gaza continue.
title: Resistance to escalate operations amid continued Israeli airstrikes on Gaza: IRGC

description: TEHRAN– Several prominent international figures, including the European Union's foreign policy chief Josep Borrell, as well as the foreign ministers of Germany and Iraq, have extended their congratulations to Abbas Araqchi following his recent appointment as Iran's Minister of Foreign Affairs.
title: Global chief diplomats congratulate Abbas Araqchi on appointment as Iran's FM

description: TEHRAN- The director of the Iranian Space Agency (ISA) has announced that there are 14 satellites planned for launch.
title: Iranian Space Agency prepares for launch of 14 satellites

description: TEHRAN- Sheikh Mohammed bin Abdulrahman Al Thani, the Qatari foreign minister, is anticipated to travel to Tehran shortly for a series of discussions.
title: Qatari FM to visit Iran for high-level political discussions

description: TEHRAN- Addressing a query regarding the anti-Iranian assertion made by the chair of the U.S. House Intelligence Committee, the spokesperson for the Iranian foreign ministry stated that nuclear weapons have never been a component of Iran's defense and security strategy.
title: ‘Nuclear weapons not part of Iran's defense, security strategy’: spox

description: TEHRAN- The Iranian ambassador to Belarus and the Belarusian Prosecutor General, Andrey Ivanovich Shved, have highlighted the importance of enhancing legal and judicial collaboration between their nations.
title: Iran, Belarus officials call for expanded legal, judicial collaboration

description: TEHRAN- Comments made by US Vice President Kamala Harris at the Democratic National Convention in Chicago about Israel’s war on Gaza showed that Washington’s claims of being a mediator in ceasefire talks between the Tel Aviv regime and Hamas ring hollow.
title: Wolf in sheep's clothing: Harris grieves for Gazans, enables Israeli genocide

description: The Israeli Army reported on Friday that 695 soldiers have been killed since the onset of its campaign in Gaza on Oct. 7, 2023.
title: Israeli army reports 695 soldiers killed since Oct. 7

description: Lebanon's Hezbollah said it carried out a strike on the Meron military base, targeting Israel's spying devices.
title: Hezbollah destroys Israeli spying devices

description: Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi arrived in Kyiv on Friday for talks with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky that will be keenly watched in Russia as its assault on its neighbor grinds on.
title: India PM Modi visits Ukraine for talks with Zelensky

description: Hamas official Osama Badran said Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu’s demand to keep Israeli troops at the Philadelphi Corridor – a strip of land along Gaza’s border with Egypt – shows he is unwilling to reach a final ceasefire deal.
title: Hamas: Netanyahu’s stance on Philadelphi Corridor shows no desire for ceasefire

description: The UN special rapporteur on the human rights situation in the occupied Palestinian territory said “imagining Israel’s continued presence in “post-war” Gaza (where the scars of its genocide are indelible)” is “absolutely legally wrong”.
title: UN expert: Israel’s presence in a post-war Gaza legally wrong

description: MADRID - As Israel continues its bombardment of Gaza, destroying infrastructure and flattening homes in the West Bank, many signatory nations of the Geneva Conventions and the Genocide Convention are still supplying oil to Israel. According to legal experts, this commercial relationship could implicate them as accomplices in the severe crimes being committed against the Palestinian people.
title: Firms or countries aiding Israel are complicit in Gaza genocide

description:
A collection of paintings by a Nasser Ovissi is currently on view in an exhibition at Liam Gallery.  
The exhibit runs until August 31 at the gallery located at No. 118, Fathi Shaqaqi St. near Salmas Square.
title: What’s in Tehran art galleries

description: TEHRAN- The commander-in-chief of the Iranian Army extended congratulations to the ministers of the administration of Masoud Pezeshkian for securing the vote of confidence from the Iranian Parliament.
title: Army pledges support for Pezeshkian administration's policies

description: TEHRAN-Iranian music producer, festival manager, and composer Ardavan Jafarian will be one of the guest speakers at the 10th St. Petersburg International United Cultures Forum, slated to be held in St. Petersburg, Russia, from September 11 to 14.
title: Iranian music producer to deliver speech at St. Petersburg International United Cultures Forum

description: TEHRAN-The cinematheque of House of Cinema in Tehran will screen the restored version of “The Lovers’ Wind,” a documentary directed and produced by the late French filmmaker Albert Lamorisse about Iran, on Monday.
title: House of Cinema to show restored version of Albert Lamorisse’s documentary about Iran

description: TEHRAN- Iranian short animation “In the Shadow of the Cypress”, co-directed by Hossein Molayemi and Shirin Sohani, is on screen at the 72nd edition of Melbourne International Film Festival (MIFF), which is currently underway at the Australian city.
title: Iran's “In the Shadow of the Cypress” competes at Melbourne film festival

description: TEHRAN – Iran U17 head coach is optimistic about FIVB Volleyball Boys’ U17 World Championship, where the Persians are scheduled to meet Libya in their opening match.
title: Iran to meet Libya at FIVB Boys’ U17 World Championship opener

description: TEHRAN – Alborz province, home to the first health tourism village in Iran, has set sights on drawing international visitors by enhancing infrastructures.
title: Alborz makes strides to draw intl. health tourists

description: TEHRAN - Semnan province has unveiled a new album of its finest handicrafts, marking a step in promoting local artisans and boosting the visibility of their work.
title: Semnan unveils album showcasing local handicraft

description: THERAN - A Qajar-era bathhouse in southern Iran has been officially registered on Iran’s national list of cultural heritage sites.
title: Qajar-era bathhouse added to national heritage list

description: TEHRAN – Flydubai, an Emirati government-owned low-cost airline, is set to launch direct flights to Kerman on September 9.
title: Flydubai to launch direct flights to Kerman

description: TEHRAN – Models of vintage and classic cars have been put on show at Iran’s National Car Museum, located in western Tehran.
title: Models of vintage, classic cars on show in Tehran

description: TEHRAN - Hamedan is set to celebrate its national day coinciding with Avicenna’s birth anniversary with a 15-day discount on hospitality services.
title: Hamedan’s 15-day celebration: discounts in honor of Avicenna

description: TEHRAN – An Iranian expert has conducted a research project probing the feasibility of launching shark tourism in the waters surrounding Chabahar in the Sea of Oman.
title: Feasibility study conducted on shark tourism in southern Iran

description: TEHRAN –Head of the Iranian Space Agency (ISA), Hossein Salarieh, has announced that 14 domestically manufactured satellites are ready to be launched in the near future, and 30 others are being built for different purposes.
title: Iranian Space Agency to launch 14 satellites in near future

description: TEHRAN –An Iranian knowledge-based product, GearMaster VR, has been announced among the top ten finalists in XR Education and Training Solution of the Year.
title: Iranian knowledge-based product among XR Awards finalists

description: TEHRAN –The 24th International Congress on Cardiovascular Updates is scheduled to be held from September 17 to 20 in Tehran.
title: Intl. Congress on Cardiovascular Updates to be held

description: TEHRAN –Under a newly launched initiative, titled Green DADRAS, the Iranian Red Crescent Society (IRCS) and the United Nations Children’s Fund (UNICEF) in collaboration with the Climate Change Secretariat aim to promote students’ climate literacy.
title: IRCS, UNICEF to boost students’ knowledge in climate change

description: TEHRAN - Iran's Renewable Energy and Energy Efficiency Organization (SATBA) is offering 40,000 megawatts (MW) of wind power plant projects to investors, an official with the organization said.
title: SATBA offering 40,000 MW capacity of wind power plant projects to investors

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s Petropars Company begins the operations for drilling three infill wells at South Pars gas field which Iran shares with Qatar in the Persian Gulf, Shana reported.
title: Drilling operations begin for 3 infill wells at South Pars gas field

description: TEHRAN - The Islamic Republic of Iran Customs Administration (IRICA) said 4.227 million cellphone handsets, valued at $966.4 million, were imported into the country in the first five months of the current Iranian calendar year (March 20–August 21), IRNA reported.
title: Iran imports over 4m cellphones in 5 months

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s new Industry, Mining, and Trade Minister Mohammad Atabak has said his programs will be mainly focused on realizing production leap under the framework of the Seventh National Development Plan.
title: Industry Ministry to focus on increasing domestic production, says new minister

description: TEHRAN – Newly-appointed sports minister Ahmad Donyamali extended best wishes to all Iranian athletes who will compete in the 2024 Paralympic Games.
title: Sports minister Donyamali extends wishes for Iran Paralympic delegation

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s new Oil Minister Mohsen Paknejad has outlined the ministry’s short-term plans, stressing resolving the energy imbalance in the country as a priority, Shana reported.
title: Iran’s new oil minister outlines short-term plans

description: TEHRAN – A group of manufacturers from Iran and Russia have discussed ways to strengthen exchanges in the spare parts and automotive manufacturing sectors in a meeting on the sidelines of the MIMS Automobility Moscow 2024, IRNA reported.
title: Iran, Russia discuss expansion of ties in car industry

description: TEHRAN – A group of manufacturers from Iran and Russia have discussed ways to strengthen exchanges in the spare parts and automotive manufacturing sectors in a meeting on the sidelines of the MIMS Automobility Moscow 2024, IRNA reported.
title: Iran, Russia discuss expansions of ties in car industry

description: TEHRAN – Non-oil commodities valued at $1.542 billion were exported from East Azarbaijan province, in the northwest of Iran, in the past Iranian calendar year 1402 (ended on March 19), a provincial official announced.
title: Products worth over $1.5b exported from East Azarbaijan in a year

description: TEHRAN- Production of red meat in Iran stood at 31,952 tons in the fourth Iranian calendar month Tir (June 21-July 21), the Statistical Center of Iran (SCI) announced.
title: Nearly 32,000 tons of red meat supplied in a month

description: TEHRAN - Persepolis football team managed to escape with a point Thursday night in Matchweek 2 of the 2024/25 Iran Persian Gulf Professional League (PGPL).
title: 10-man Persepolis escape with point against Tractor
